name: Sunshine DEMO
description:
Everyone has a gift. They just need to receive it. Welcome to Sunshine! Experience the journey of a boy named Scarlo who’s lost his memory. Travel through interesting areas with fun characters, turned based combat, and hard rock music!

This is my first game! It’s a project I’ve been working on for many months, and I’m very excited to share this with you all! Note: this is a Demo! There will (hopefully) be a full release in the future! Please stay tuned and complete the feedback form! https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdqQq5HjTcsBA7oMwiD-nwreRTJVztTcd9xyiGcKfIVIP93dg/viewform?usp=sf_link
